Articles.Content: The hill appears too heavy and crushes you. Untaken hill.

Stingy claims the hill.

His hill.

I tell Stingy to not be such a schmuck and to back off.

My hill.

I eat you since you are a sandwich

my hill and nummy sandwich

I report you for eating of another person. I take the hill as you are in jail.

My hill.

I get compensation from the police department in the form of a hill closely guarded by cameras, vicious attack dogs, ADT, and armed aircraft.

Anyone who takes it will be prosecuted.
Russian mafia makes all policemen mercenaries, all your hill and all policemen now belongs to Russian mafia.

HA! Yuo mafia no have of glorious serkit dokuments modified KV-2! xaxaxaxaxaxaxaxaxaxaxa)))))))))))))))))))))))

My glorious soviet hill protected by a KV-2.

Capitalism.

My hill.

Mao.

My hill.

*Penalty for talking! Penalty for [obscure reference](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mao_%28card_game%29)! Penalty for [utilizing metagame](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/President_%28card_game%29)!*

Feudalism.

My hill.

Minamoto Yoritomo's Shogun now.

His hill.

Anarchy

My hill.

democracy

my hill

Constitutional Republic.

*'Murica*

Intercontinental Metropolitan Covenant

**Edited <time datetime="2017-03-20T05:18:39Z" title="03/20/2017 05:18  AM" data-short="7 yr">March 20, 2017</time> by kerbiloid**

The Thousand Sons legion arrives and forces your hill into compliance.

The God-Emperor's hill.

A nurse splashes a bucket with remains of anthelmintics solution on the hill.

The water makes God-Emperor mad and he eats his legion.  

The anthelmintics eradicate him, because he is a sandworm.

Hospital septic hill.

I create a new hill to leave the hospital in peace.

my hill

I too see no reason to dispute the previous posters.

My other hill.

I take both hills by bribing both of you with a cookie.

(No one better steal it)

A bakery provides a hill of cookies and stay unbribable.

Baker Hill

I eat the cookie hill.

no hill

I make a steak hill to keep out all the vegans.

My hill.

I eat your hill.

My land.
